ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable VARs when in ENV mode

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string. Get this from @BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: Your Bot Username. Without `@` before Username!

MAIN_CHANNEL.description: Your Bot's Log Channel's Username. For Help ask in @linux_repo

ARCHIVE_CHANNEL.description: Your Bot's Log Channel's Username. For Help ask in @linux_repo

MESSAGE_ID.description: Allow only pre-defined users to use this bot as Sudo User. Separate with Space. Just for using Admin Commands.
